meanings: advantage, strength, merit, strong point, virtue
strengthen the strength and make up for the weakness
개인 신상 What are your merits?
개인 신상 Tell me about your strong points.
개인 신상 What is your best trait?

examples.korean: He was extolling the virtues of the Internet. 발음듣기 그는 인터넷의 장점을 극찬하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The plan has the virtue of simplicity. 발음듣기 그 계획은 단순하다는 장점이 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The plan has the virtue of simplicity. 발음

examples.korean: The book’s virtues far outweigh its faults. 발음듣기 그 책은 장점이 흠보다 훨씬 많다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The book’s virtues far outweigh its faults. 발음

examples.korean: She had the advantage of a good education. 발음듣기 그녀는 교육을 잘 받았다는 장점이 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had the advantage of a good education. 발음
